apihelp-query+tdbrelations-summary: Lists all arrangement and duplicate relations between canon Touhou music themes.
apihelp-query+tdbrelations-extended-desc:
The returned object uses theme IDs ("<release ID>_<two-digit track number within release>") as its keys. Their values bundle the following information for each arrangement or duplicate in a two-element array:
  1. The relation type: "a" for arrangements, "d" for duplicates
  2. An array of source theme IDs
apihelp-query+tdbrelations-example-sane: Get the data without MediaWiki's dumb "batchcomplete" value.
apihelp-query+tdbtitles-summary: Lists all existing title translations for Touhou music themes in a given language.
apihelp-query+tdbtitles-extended-descrip:
The returned object uses language-specific theme IDs ("<release ID>_<two-digit track number within release>/language") as its keys. Their values are either
  • strings, for the title of a theme
  • or, for themes with duplicated titles, one-element arrays with the language-specific theme ID of the original title. This referenced ID is always part of the returned list.
apihelp-query+tdbtitles-example-ja: Get the original Japanese theme titles of the entire series, in a compact raw UTF-8 JSON format, and without MediaWiki's dumb "batchcomplete" value.
apihelp-query+tdbtitles-example-eo: Get all existing theme title translations into Esperanto across the entire series, in a compact raw UTF-8 JSON format, and without MediaWiki's dumb "batchcomplete" value.
